messages.msgSnippet: ... Commentary on the state of sex-ed in the school system? lol One time when DH was in college, a publication went out welcoming a new employee in the
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "frozenandcold"
<fivefreebirds@m...> wrote:
> She is just not learning
> what pubic school says she "needs" to learn.
> Heidi

Commentary on the state of sex-ed in the school system? lol

One time when DH was in college, a publication went out welcoming a
new employee in the department of "pubic relations" - boy was there a
lot of laughter about that one!

--Deb

messages.subject: oh no
messages.msgSnippet: But, very cool for you daughter!!  Write that down in your journal so your husband can see how she is LEARNING!  She is just not learning what pubic school
messages.messageBody:
But, very cool for you daughter!! Write that down in your journal so
your husband can see how she is LEARNING! She is just not learning
what pubic school says she "needs" to learn. But just maybe she will
be a vet or something! Or just maybe she will always love animals and
it is just an interest. Very cool! Thanks for sharing!

Heidi
